overview.title: Welcome to the Veterans' Preference Guide

content.text: This guide provides comprehensive information about veterans' preference in federal employment.
Navigate through the sections to learn about eligibility, different preference types, required documentation, and an assessment tool to help determine your potential eligibility.

items: Identify necessary documentation for your application

content.text: To be eligible for veterans' preference, you must meet certain criteria related to your military service.
Generally, you must have been honorably discharged from active duty in the U.S. Armed Forces.

items: Served in a campaign or expedition for which a campaign badge has been authorized
Received an Armed Forces Expeditionary Medal or a Vietnam Service Medal

content.text: Veterans with service-connected disabilities may be eligible for 10-point preference.
